subject: To buy or not to buy?
body:
You need to buy lots of meds, but you don't want to pay huge sums of money? 
All this you can find here
Viagra, Cialis, Levitra, Valium, Phentermine - they are all licensed and are the best quality!
Everything for your health
Pay less and get the licensed medications you are looking for. 
With best regards,
Paula Fox
 
 
Skazki dlia norogryzok. Metallicheskie, tolshchinoj s Provoloku, okovki, otpolirovannye do zerkalnogo bleska, shli po vsej dline reber S ravnymi promezhutkami, soobshchaia im prochnost i sluzha ukrasheniem odnovremenno. Chto-chto, a eto Bochonok znal prekrasno boltlivyh iazykov Sredi uchenikov Doma hvatalo, vziat hotia by sobstvennogo plemiasha tozhe iazyk bez Kostej. Ne rasslabliajsia, Devochka. 
Tak i est, za nej uzhe ne bylo Tumannogo koridora. 18. Nogi Sroslis s zemlej. Prosto hald, pozhalovavshij v Siiaiushchij, po vsej veroiatnosti, pribyl iz ochen dalekih kraev. Kak mozhno liubit neliudia? Ty smogla by Poliubit, skazhem, nubesa? Ty preuvelichivaesh. Vysokie Figury novopribyvshih pochti do piat okutyvali plashchi iz blestiashchego Iarko-krasnogo materiala, lysye zheltye cherepa tusklo otsvechivali v serom Svete dnia. Ia videl konej po Vizoseti v kakom-to Fantasticheskom seriale u sebia doma, na Nove-2; kazhetsia, oni obitaiut na Marsane, V mire sonnogo pastushego zaholustia gde-to na periferii Federacii. Dostalos i Kengshu, hotia on v popytke uvernutsia i sdelal moshchnyj pryzhok v storonu. 
Chem menshe problem pri vstreche s shefirom, tem Luchshe. Kogda chuzhaki Otpravlialis v Krug Prichastiia, on ni na chto osobo ne nadeialsia. Ia s trudom uderzhalsia ot zloradnoj usmeshki. Vot Zlo ego zaderi, podumal ia. ejisuminyon VVFcRlhQUVh0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
